page.title: 17A TRADITIONAL INDIAN RECIPE
page.content:
{BOMBAY HALWA A traditional Indian sweetmeat
{Ingredients 12oz sugar 1/2pt water 2oz cornflour 2oz unsalted butter 2oz cashew nuts 2oz almonds 2oz pistachios 2 cardamoms Juice of 1 lemon {Method Dissolve sugar in water over low heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove some of the sugar solution and mix with cornflour to form a paste. Add to the rest of the solution and stir continuously. Add lemon juice and a little butter. Continue cooking until the mixture separates. Meanwhile,chop the nuts, crush the cardamoms,add to the mixture Pour into a tray and leave to cool. When cool cut in diamond shapes. Will keep indefinitely in an air tight tin.
